CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| chlorobenzene (CB) |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| chlorobenzene (CB) |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 27 In chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution , PIDT - EHNT showed an absorption maximum at 599 nm and a slightly weaker peak at 433 nm ; when changing the branched 2ethylhexyl to linear hexyl side chain , the resulted polymer PIDT - DTNT showed a slightly bathochromic shift of two corresponding peaks to 608 and 439 nm , respectively , which may due to the reduced steric hindrance of the linear side chain.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - EHNT at 599 nm |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - EHNT at 433 nm |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - DTNT at 608 nm |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - DTNT at 439 nm |
| chlorobenzene ( CB ) solution |
| PIDT - EHNT |
| PIDT - DTNT |
| branched 2ethylhexyl side chain |
| linear hexyl side chain |
| slightly bathochromic shift |
| two corresponding peaks |
| reduced steric hindrance |
| linear side chain |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - EHNT at 599 nm (nm) |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - EHNT at 433 nm (nm) |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - DTNT at 608 nm (nm) |
| absorption maximum of PIDT - DTNT at 439 nm (nm) |
| chlorobenzene (solvent) solution |

| reduced steric hindrance (molecular property) |

Note: I assumed that "nm" is a unit of measurement for the absorption maximum values, and "spectroscopic property" is a category of material property that refers to the interaction of electromagnetic radiation with a material.
